#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
bool b[1000002];
int main()
{
	int i=1,x;
	while((x=(pow(2,i)))<=1000000)
	{
	   	 b[x]=1;
	   	 i++;
	}	
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
        cin>>i;
        if(b[i]==1)
          cout<<"BKUL"<<endl;
         else
		  cout<<"BMEENA" <<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
